README.html.title: RegularExpressions.Transformer | LinksPlatform's Platform.RegularExpressions.Transformer Library
README.html.keywords: C# Python Nim RegularExpressions.Transformer LinksPlatform's Platform.RegularExpressions.Transformer Class Library. Another way to transform text is to use chain of regular expression in the sed command. sed -e 's/first match/first substution/g' -e 's/second match/second substution/g' Namespace: Platform.RegularExpressions.Transformer Forked from: LinksPlatform/Collections.Methods/CSharpToCppTranslator NuGet package: Platform.RegularExpressions.Transformer Python version: retranslator Documentation PDF file with code for e-readers. Dependent libraries Platform.RegularExpressions.Transformer.CSharpToCpp
